Name: Agia Varvara
Description: A municipality in West Athens known for its cultural heritage and community spirit.

Name: Aigaleo
Description: A densely populated municipality with a strong industrial and commercial presence.

Name: Chaidari
Description: A municipality in western Athens known for its green spaces and the Daphni Monastery.

Name: Eleonas
Description: A suburban area with a mix of light industrial zones and residential communities.

Name: Ilion
Description: A residential area in West Athens with parks and modern infrastructure.

Name: Peristeri
Description: One of the largest municipalities in Athens, known for its bustling commercial areas.

Name: Petroupoli
Description: A municipality at the foothills of Mount Parnitha, offering great natural scenery.
